languages.text: "Безумие. Безумие, гордыня и чудовищная, кощунственная ересь". {n}Голос Хейнрикса едва слышен — кажется, от шока ему перехватило горло.{/n}
"This is madness. Madness, pride, and monstrous, staggering heresy." {n}Heinrix's voice is barely audible, as if his throat has closed up in shock.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Безумие. Безумие, гордыня и чудовищная, кощунственная ересь". {n}Голос Хейнрикса едва слышен — кажется, от шока ему перехватило горло.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "This is madness. Madness, pride, and monstrous, staggering heresy." {n}Heinrix's voice is barely audible, as if his throat has closed up in shock.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This is madness. Madness, pride, and monstrous, staggering heresy." {n}Heinrix's voice is barely audible, as if his throat has closed up in shock.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “这简直是疯了。疯狂、傲慢、残忍、令人发指的异端行为。”{n}海因里希的声音几乎无法听清，仿佛他的喉管都由于震惊而闭上了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is madness. Madness, pride, and monstrous, staggering heresy." {n}Heinrix's voice is barely audible, as if his throat has closed up in shock.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这简直是疯了。疯狂、傲慢、残忍、令人发指的异端行为。”{n}海因里希的声音几乎无法听清，仿佛他的喉管都由于震惊而闭上了。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Esto es una locura. Locura, orgullo y una herejía monstruosa y abrumadora». {n}La voz de Heinrix es casi inaudible, como si se le hubiera cerrado la garganta de la impresión.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is madness. Madness, pride, and monstrous, staggering heresy." {n}Heinrix's voice is barely audible, as if his throat has closed up in shock.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Esto es una locura. Locura, orgullo y una herejía monstruosa y abrumadora». {n}La voz de Heinrix es casi inaudible, como si se le hubiera cerrado la garganta de la impresión.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「これは狂気だ。狂気、プライド、怪物的、驚くほどの異端だ」{n}ハインリックスの声は、ショックで喉が詰まってしまったかのようにほとんど聞こえない。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is madness. Madness, pride, and monstrous, staggering heresy." {n}Heinrix's voice is barely audible, as if his throat has closed up in shock.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「これは狂気だ。狂気、プライド、怪物的、驚くほどの異端だ」{n}ハインリックスの声は、ショックで喉が詰まってしまったかのようにほとんど聞こえない。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « C'est de la folie. Vous avez laissé votre orgueil vous pousser à commettre une hérésie révoltante. » {n}La voix d'Heinrix est à peine audible, comme si sa gorge était nouée par l'émotion.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is madness. Madness, pride, and monstrous, staggering heresy." {n}Heinrix's voice is barely audible, as if his throat has closed up in shock.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « C'est de la folie. Vous avez laissé votre orgueil vous pousser à commettre une hérésie révoltante. » {n}La voix d'Heinrix est à peine audible, comme si sa gorge était nouée par l'émotion.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Das ist Wahnsinn. Wahnsinn, Hochmut und monströse, gewaltige Ketzerei." {n}Heinrix' Stimme ist kaum hörbar, als hätte seine Kehle sich im Schock verschlossen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is madness. Madness, pride, and monstrous, staggering heresy." {n}Heinrix's voice is barely audible, as if his throat has closed up in shock.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Das ist Wahnsinn. Wahnsinn, Hochmut und monströse, gewaltige Ketzerei." {n}Heinrix' Stimme ist kaum hörbar, als hätte seine Kehle sich im Schock verschlossen.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Delilik bu. Delilik, kibir ve canavarsı, akıl almaz bir kâfirlik." {n}Heinrix'in sesi, yaşadığı şok nedeniyle boğazı tıkanmış gibi güçlükle çıkıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is madness. Madness, pride, and monstrous, staggering heresy." {n}Heinrix's voice is barely audible, as if his throat has closed up in shock.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Delilik bu. Delilik, kibir ve canavarsı, akıl almaz bir kâfirlik." {n}Heinrix'in sesi güçlükle duyulabiliyor. Boğazı yaşadığı şok nedeniyle tıkanmış gibi sanki.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
